text:
Also nominated for the best picture category, Black Panther is already stealing all the limelight at Oscars 2019. Not one but the Marvel superhero movie has won two awards already! With that, it has helped Marvel Studios bag its first ever Oscars ever!
Black Panther has won Best Costume Design for Ruth E. Carter and Best Production Design for Hannah Beachler. It has beaten the likes of The Favourite and Mary Poppins Returns.
Twitter
Not only this, E. Carter has also become the first black woman ever to have won the Oscar for Best Costume Design.
Twitter
Not only that, this is also the first time a black woman (Hannah Beachler) has ever won the Oscar for Best Production Design.
